General.Name: WuXi Xinje Electric Co Ltd
General.Description: WuXi Xinje Electric Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of industrial automation products in China and internationally. The company offers programmable logic controller, human-machine interface, integrated controller, special modules, and integral controller for industrial control; and server system, stepping system, inverter for sport control. It also provides WIFI modules, 4GBOX, and other wireless communication modules, as well as Ethernet-based communication modules; cloud platform; and smart cameras, robot controllers, manipulator, and teaching pendants. The company's products are used in various fields of automation, including printing and packaging, food and drink, sewing, machining assembly, textile, electronics manufacturing, machine tool, building materials, and other related industries and fields. WuXi Xinje Electric Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2008 and is headquartered in Wuxi, China.
